How does a successful CON roll affect damage from poisons?
an Extreme CON roll will halve damage from poisons.

What is required for a Hard success when a character is in a state of physical exertion?
A Hard success on the CON roll.

What happens to damage from poisons if a character scores an Extreme CON roll?
The damage is halved.

What are some symptoms of poisoning in Call of Cthulhu?
stomach pains, vomiting, diarrhea, chills, sweats, cramps, jaundice, altered heart rate, impaired vision, convulsions, unconsciousness, and paralysis.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can a poison's effects be shaken off in Call of Cthulhu?
Yes, in certain circumstances, Keepers may allow a poison's effects to be shaken off if the CON roll is a critical success.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How is the order of a round determined in Call of Cthulhu?
The order is determined by the DEX roll, with a higher roll taking precedence. If the DEX roll is a failure, the previous roll is retained.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if a character rolls worse on a re-roll in Call of Cthulhu?
The character retains their previous place in the order.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the default order of initiative in the system?
Colin, Harvey, then the cultist.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does the second cultist fit into the initiative order?
He slots into the initiative order after the first cultist.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of success is required to re-roll initiative with a bonus die?
A Hard success.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a target when it is reduced to zero hit points?
The target falls unconscious automatically.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when an attack inflicts a Major Wound on a target?
The target must make a CON roll to remain conscious.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition that automatically causes a target to fall unconscious?
A target that is reduced to zero hit points will fall unconscious automatically.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of a Hard success on Colin's initiative roll?
This places him first in the order of initiative.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the consequence of a character suffering a significant lasting damage?
The character will be knocked out.
